meanings.definition: The act of gathering or collecting wood.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the wooding in the forest began to rebuild the fallen trees.
meanings.sent2: Every autumn, the wooding for the fireplace keeps us warm during winter.
meanings.sent3: The wooding for the campfire turned into a friendly competition among the scouts.
meanings.sent4: The wooding in the lumberyard resembled a bustling ant colony.
meanings.sent5: The sound of wooding echoed through the woods as the lumberjacks worked.

meanings.definition: The process of treating or preserving wood.
meanings.sent1: The wooding of the old furniture restored its shine and durability.
meanings.sent2: Proper wooding can prevent termite damage in wooden structures.
meanings.sent3: The wooding of the wooden boat made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The meticulous wooding of the antique chair brought out its rich color.
meanings.sent5: The wooding process involved carefully applying a protective finish to the wood.

meanings.definition: The act of covering or decorating with wood.
meanings.sent1: The wooding of the cabin walls gave it a cozy, rustic feel.
meanings.sent2: The wooding of the stage set transformed it into a forest scene.
meanings.sent3: The wooding of the treehouse made it blend seamlessly with the surrounding forest.
meanings.sent4: The wooding of the ceiling beams added a touch of natural beauty to the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate wooding on the door panels showcased the craftsmanship of the carpenter.
